==Algorithms Installation==

 * X!Tandem

Installation:

`wget ftp://ftp.thegpm.org/projects/tandem/source/tandem-linux-10-12-01-1.tar.gz`
`tar xvfz tandem-linux-10-12-01-1.tar.gz`

Folder:
`/scratch/metaprot/software/xtandem`

Example usage:
`./xtandem.exe input.xml`


 * OMSSA

Installation:

`wget ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/pub/lewisg/omssa/CURRENT/omssa-linux.tar.gz`
`tar xvfz omssa-linux.tar.gz`

Folder:
`/scratch/metaprot/software/omssa`

Installation BLAST:

`wget ftp://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov/blast/executables/LATEST/ncbi-blast-2.2.25+-x64-linux.tar.gz`
`tar xvfz ncbi-blast-2.2.25+-x64-linux.tar.gz`

Folder:
`/scratch/metaprot/software/blast`


 * Crux

Installation:

`wget http://noble.gs.washington.edu/proj/crux/download/crux_1.36-x86_64-Linux.zip`
`unzip crux_1.36-x86_64-Linux.zip`

Folder:
`/scratch/metaprot/software/crux`


 * Inspect

Installation:

`wget http://proteomics.ucsd.edu/Downloads/Inspect.20101012.zip`
`unzip Inspect.20101012.zip`

Dependencies: expat, python-numpy

Folder:
`/scratch/metaprot/software/inspect`

==Server Startup==
Finally, the server can be started via a startup script `startserver.sh` or the following usage:

`nohup java -jar mpa-server-X.Y.Z.jar -XmxXXXXm` where XXXX stands for the megabytes of RAM
